Pre-Game Insights: Guyana will be up against some of the more experienced sides in the region for the 2024-25 CONCACAF Nations League
Under Jamal Shabazz, Guyana won all five of their matches in League B last year and finished with a goal difference of +15
Miscellaneous Highlights: Guyana go into the match off the back of a 3-1 win over Belize in their last World Cup qualifier in June
Suriname have yet to lose in three matches played across all competitions since the appointment of Stanley Menzo in March
Others: Guyana have won four of their six Nations League matches at the Synthetic Track and Field Facility
Natio have only suffered one defeat in their previous seven matches played across all competitions
